lines.text: Sven is not east to sum up. His disposition is much more powerful, and he is much more strong-willed than you think first meeting him.

"That was fine!" - But when I see the rushes, I can see that the camera has seen much more than I've seen. It is an incredible instrument for registering the human soul as reflected in the human face.
It was as though you could grab hold of the lighting, which he had created.
